titles.title: He Dies, the Friend of Sinners Dies

comments.comment: This hymnal has not been proofed - data may be incomplete or incorrect

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: He dies, the Friend of sinners dies! Lo! Salem's daughters weep around. A solemn darkness veils the skies; a sudden trembling shakes the ground.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Here's love and grief beyond degree: the Lord of glory dies for men; but lo, what sudden joys we see! Jesus, the dead, revives again.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: The rising God forsakes the tomb! The tomb in vain forbids His rise: Cherubic legions guard Him home, And shout Him welcome to the skies.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Break off your tears, ye saints, and tell how high your great Deliv'rer reigns. Sing how He spoiled the hosts of hell, and led the monster, Death, in chains.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: Say: "Live forever, wondrous King, born to redeem, and strong to save!" Then ask the monster: "Where's thy sting? And where's thy vict'ry, boasting grave?"
